name: yandex-translate-in-context
title: Yandex translate - from anything to Russian (or from Russian to English)
description: Translate selected word or phrase over translate.yandex.ru from any lang to Russian (or from Russian to English) - result in context menu (right click). Minimum and fast. Unofficial extension. https://github.com/vitaly-zdanevich/extension-firefox-yandex-translate
author: Vitaly Zdanevich
